mapper.select: select b_no,i_name, i_price, b_count, (i_price * b_count) as b_sumprice from basket WHERE m_no = #{m_no}
mapper.update: update basket set b_count=#{b_count} where b_no=#{b_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket (b_no, f_no, i_no, b_count, i_price, i_name, b_sumprice, m_no) SELECT basket_seq.NEXTVAL, fi.f_no, fi.i_no, #{b_count}, i.i_price, i.i_name, (i.i_price * #{b_count}), #{m_no} FROM food_ingredients fi JOIN ingredients i ON fi.i_no = i.i_no WHERE fi.f_no = #{f_no} AND fi.i_no = #{i_no}
